long_description: The Chili's Jellie sunglasses are designed to let kids start smart habits early. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate frames are strong and acid- and heat-resistant. Pink frames feature brown lenses. Blue frames feature smoke gray lenses. Sized to fit small faces.
short_description: The Chili's Jellie sunglasses are designed to let kids start smart habits early.
